summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Executive Department, Office of Emergency Employment, adopting an amendment to the Grant agreement to provide employment opportunities with the City and other local government agencies under the authority of Section VI of the Emergency Employment Act of 1971; creating certain additional positions in the Executive Department, Office of Emergency Employment; increasing certain budget accounts, authorizing additional expenditures and amending contracts in implementation thereof, and making an additional reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and the emergency therefor.
